thread.title: Sentry Management Joins With A&M Properties for Major Presence in Denver Area

author: cnbc.com
title: Sentry Management Joins With A&M Properties for Major Presence in Denver Area
text:
Denver Colorado, May 07, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) --
Sentry Management, Inc. has joined forces with A & M Properties, LLC to significantly expand the number of homeowner and condominium associations managed in the Denver CO area.
Matt Eagan (left), Division Manager and Matthew Oates (right) Vice President, oversee Sentry's newly expanded Colorado office.
"We are pleased to welcome the entire A & M Properties team to Sentry. Immediately, we are a better company together," said Bradley Pomp, President of Sentry Management. "As one company, we will serve our new community clients to the highest standard of community management.”
“We are thrilled to be joining Sentry Management,” said Matt Eagan, founder of A & M. “Sentry’s proven track record of homeowner satisfaction, advanced operating systems and deep association management experience will enable us to bring even more value to the communities we manage.”
Howard Pomp, CEO of Sentry Management, has been working on the addition of A & M for some time. “I am thoroughly impressed with Matt Eagan and his staff’s dedication to the Boards and communities they serve. A & M Properties has built an incredible positive reputation since opening five years ago. Merging Sentry’s 43 years of know-how with A & M Properties expertise in the market area allows us to offer communities even greater service levels and professionalism.”
Matt Oates, Sentry’s current Colorado Vice President, will oversee operations and people. Matt Egan will continue with Sentry Management as the Division Manager for the entire Denver area. Sentry will retain the A & M Properties employees, who become Sentry employees. Over the coming months, Sentry will combine the two companies into a single location in a manner that will improve long-term service to homeowners living in both HOA and condominium associations.
The service area for this Sentry office is the City and County of Denver, as well as the counties of Jefferson, Arapahoe, and Adams.
To learn more, go to https://denver.sentrymgt.com .
Sentry Management is a full-service community management company. Sentry’s business is the day-to-day operation of communities, homeowner associations and condominiums. Sentry is accredited as an AMO® (Accredited Management Organization) by the Institute of Real Estate Management, providing an independent evaluation that Sentry has one of the highest operating and financial standards in the industry. Sentry operates in dozens of localities in Florida, Arizona, Colorado, Connecticut, Georgia, Idaho, Iowa, Indiana, Maryland, Missouri, New Mexico, North Carolina, South Carolina, Tennessee, and Virginia.
Attachment
Matt Eagan & Matt Oates, Sentry Management Denver Paul Queen Sentry Management Inc. 407-788-6700 marketing@sentrymgt.com
